Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed near 37th
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near 37th due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near 37th due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
